data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR Regulations 2015 please be informed that Mr. Kuldeep Sharma Head of Sales & Marketing has ceased to be the Senior Managerial Personnel with effect from 2nd february 2026.

In his place Ms. Manjusha Singh has joined with effect from 2nd February 2026.

data.news_body:
This is in furtherance to the disclosure filed by the Company on December 11 2025 by DIC India Limited.

On 10.12.2025 Agam has served an advance copy of the petition challenging the interim award dated 20.08.2025 before the Delhi High Court.

The said matter was listed before the honble high court on 17.12.2025 the Company has issued a notice upon the Company to file its reply.

data.news_body: The Arbitral Tribunal by way of interim dividend awarded the following in favour of Company this is to inform you that Agam has served an advance copy of the petition challenging aforesaid interim award under section 34 of the Arbitration and Conciliation Act 1996 before the Honble High Court of Delhi seeking setting aside of Interim Award.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: The Board of Directors in its meeting has approved the appointment of Mr. Avijit Mukerji as an additional director in the category of Independent Director.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On December 10 2025
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of DIC India Limited in its
meeting held on Wednesday December 10 2025 (meeting commenced at 11:15 A.M. and concluded at 6:30
P.M.) had inter alia considered and approved the following business:
1. Appointment of Director/Change in the Board of Directors.
The Board of Directors based on the recommendation of Nomination & Remuneration Committee
have approved the appointment of Mr. Avijit Mukerji (DIN: 03534116) as an additional Director in
the category of Independent Director w.e.f. December 10 2025 subject to the approval of the
Members of the Company.

2. Approval for upcoming postal ballot Postal Ballot for seeking shareholders approval for
appointment of Mr. Avijit Mukerji as an additional Director in the category of Independent Director
and all the necessary actions in connection therewith.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Receipt Of Order Under Section 73(1) Of Karnataka Goods And Service Tax Act 2017 Central Goods And Service Tax Act 2017 And Section 20 Of The Integ
data.news_body: This is in furtherance to the disclosure made on September 29 2025 involving demand of INR 67107387 the said demand has now been reduced to INR 381602.

data.news_body: filing of execution petition under section 36 of the Arbitration and Conciliation Act 1996 filed by the company against Agam Agochars Private Limited.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015- Reduction In Demand Raised In Show Cause U/S 73 Of WBGST Act 2017.
data.news_body:
This is in furtherance of the disclosure made on 13th September 2025 please be informed that GST department West Bengal has issued order in form DRC 07 in respect of the show cause notice (DRC 01) .
As per the said notice the Company received demand of INR 55465222/- .
However basis the representation before the Joint Commissioner LTU Corporate Division West Bengal the said demand has been reduced to INR 467740 in the final order.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for LIMITED REVIEWED FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE QUARTER AND NINE MONTHS ENDED 30TH SEPTEMBER 2025.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of DIC India Limited in its meeting held on Thursday November 13 2025 (meeting commenced at 2:00 P.M. and concluded at 3:45 P.M.) has inter alia considered and approved the following business:
1. Un-audited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended September 30 2025.
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing and other Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 the Board of Directors of the Company approved the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended September 30 2025. The copy of aforesaid results along with limited review report of the statutory auditors issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company i.e. M/s. Price Waterhouse Chartered Accountants LLP are enclosed herewith as Annexure-A.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR Regulation 2015 we hereby enclose a copy of Postal Ballot Notice seeking approval of the members of the Company by way of remote e voting in respect of the following ordinary resolution.

1. Appointment of Mr. Navapol Chuensiri as the Non Executive Non Independent Director liable to retire by rotation.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Para A Of Part A Of Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 In The Matter Of Order Passed By The Income Tax Department.
data.news_body:
This is furtherance to the disclosure made by the Company on March 25 2025 regarding order under section 143(3) of the Income Tax Act issued by the Income Tax Department raising a tax demand of Rs. 6407051 including interest for FY 2019-20 (AY 2020-21) wherein the Company had filed an appeal against the said demand before ITAT The Honble ITAT had partly allowed the appeal and directed and directed the Ld. Transfer Pricing Officer to pass the order giving the appeal effect.
In this regard please be apprised that now order giving appeal effect has been passed by the Learned Assessing Officer reducing the demand to INR 336723.

data.news_body: In furtherance to the disclosure made on July 25 2025 the Company is filing an update on matter of tax litigation

Dear Madam/Sir,
In compliance to Regulation 30 & 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, it is to inform that the Board of Directors of DIC India Limited in its meeting held today i.e. Friday, August 04, 2023 (meeting commenced at 4:00 P.M. and concluded at 7: 20 P.M. had inter-alia considered and approved the following:

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Additional Details Required For Corporate Announcement Filed Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: Ref: Outcome of Board Meeting held on November 10, 2022 and your mail dated November 11, 2022

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
1. Approval of Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter/nine month ended September 30, 2022

2. Reappointment of Mr. Sandip Chatterjee as Chief Financial Officer (CFO) and Key Managerial Personnel (KMP) upon superannuation

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
This is to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. August 12, 2022, have considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter and Half year ended June 30, 2022.

Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for Quarter and Half year ended June 30, 2022, along with the copy of Limited Review Report conducted by the Statutory Auditors, M/s. Deloitte Haskins & Sells LLP, Chartered Accountants.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. May 11, 2022, approved the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended March 31, 2022.

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for quarter ended March 31, 2022, along with the copy of Limited Review Report conducted by the Statutory Auditors, M/s. Deloitte Haskins & Sells LLP, Chartered Accountants.

data.caption: Approval Of Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e.
November 12, 2021, have considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter
ended September 30, 2021.
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements)
Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for Quarter ended
September 30, 2021, along with the copy of Limited Review Report conducted by the Statutory
Auditors, M/s. Deloitte Haskins & Sells LLP, Chartered Accountants.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. August 11, 2021, have considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter and Half year ended June 30, 2021.
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for Quarter and Half year ended June 30, 2021, along with the copy of Limited Review Report conducted by the Statutory Auditors, M/s. The information is also available on the website of the Company (www.dic.co.in) .

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for quarter ended March 31, 2021, along with the copy of Limited Review Report conducted by the Statutory Auditors, M/s.
